subject: resource/Franco_Abbiati
object: Franco Abbiati (14 September 1898 - 22 January 1981) was an Italian musicologist.Abbiati was born in Verdello. He studied composition at the musical high school in Turin. He worked as a  music critic for Corriere della Sera for thirty-six years. The award Premio Franco Abbiati della Critica Musicale Italiana is named after him.
human_readable: Franco Abbiati was an Italian musicologist born in Verdello, who studied composition at the musical high school in Turin and worked as a music critic for Corriere della Sera for thirty-six years, with his legacy being honored by the Premio Franco Abbiati della Critica Musicale Italiana award.
